item.title: MySQL InnoDB Locking and Isolation Level
item.description: Basic knowledge Isolation Level MySQL innodb engine support ACID appliance. (The following will be always applied to innodb) Innodb supports 4 Isolation Levels: READ UNCOMMITTED, READ COMMITTED, UNREPEATABLE READ, SERIALIZABLE Innodb's Isolation level is slightly different from the standard SQL Isolation level definition: Repeatable Read is the default Isolation Level, which can ensure repeatable reads and no phantom reads. Index structure InnoDB has two types of index: clustered index, secondary indexes
